description: With the threat of losing his job, the office junior has no choice but to surrender to his boss’ demands. His therapy begins with a good, hard over the knee spanking before she uses a permanent marker pen on his forehead, giving him his new name for all to see. Over the next few days he learns his new role beneath her. He will be her stress toy, and at her complete beck and call from now on.
title: Corrective Therapy
